SELECT cib.id, cib.Uid, cib.title, cib.regDate, cib.updateDate, COUNT(cibc.id) AS commentCount FROM customer_inquiry_board cib LEFT JOIN customer_inquiry_comment cibc ON cib.id = cibc.C_Board_id
AND cib.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY cib.id, cib.Uid, cib.title, cib.regDate, cib.updateDate
HAVING commentCount < 1
ORDER BY cib.updateDate DESC, cib.regDate DESC, cib.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{criteria.amount}
